about_the_game:
We regret to inform you that your performance at our academy has not met the standards expected of our esteemed and world-renowned alumni in the anomalous arts.

The zone-excursion programme introduced to fill the void left behind by our late-heroes is the sole option remaining for your continued studies, an exceptionally dangerous venture where only the strongest return.

Your journey cannot be completed alone, each new student joining your party will bring something new to the table with unique abilities, spells and upgrade trees.

Each character that you befriend grants:

  • A unique skill tree for that character

  • Upgradable active abilities

  • Character-specific cards to enhance your deck

During battle, each student can be given modifier cards that bring them closer to mastering the anomalous and becoming an unstoppable force.

  • Spells interact with other spells, creating an expansive range of combinations

  • Modifier spells modify the fired projectiles with effects like swift-cast and freeze-shot.

  • Cast spells change how your spells are triggered with effects like multi-shot and burst.

  • Projectile spells spawn projectiles that can damage anomalous threats.

Between each battle, perform research to gain new cards which unlock an exponential number of formidable combinations.

  • New cards unlock powerful and interesting new spells

  • Cards are designed with interesting effects in mind, some may upgrade your characters, others may grant some great boon at the cost of sacrificing something else

Each battle requires a different set of skills. Each card provides something unique, from cards which enhance a student's powers to ones that sacrifice or enhance the cards in your deck.

Discover the unknowable

As you venture deeper and deeper towards the core of the zone, the world beings to distort and the threats become greater. You feel like something is waiting for you...
detailed_description:
Demo

This is the demo for Vespia: Shield of Aberration. The game is currently still in development and this demo represents an early stage of the game which we are using to gather feedback and improve the game.

The demo contains the following features:

  • Randomised cards

  • A single starter character and spirits

  • 1 playable demo level

  • 5 enemy types

Deck-buiding and pack-opening features will be available in the full release of the game, the demo is designed to give you an experience of the short-term gameplay loop.

short_description: A dark deck-building tower defense game in a world threatened by anomalous forces. Cards interact with each other to create powerful, emergent effects. Train alongside your allies, research powerful deck combos, and prove you have what it takes.
